mapper.select: SELECT A.ipayment,B.name,C.menu,C.price,A.remainder_balance remainderBalance,A.payment_at,A.star_rating FROM d_payment A INNER JOIN ( SELECT y.imanagement,x.iuser,x.name FROM d_user x INNER JOIN d_management y ON x.iuser=y.iuser ) B ON A.imanagement=B.imanagement INNER JOIN d_menu C ON A.imenu=C.imenu WHERE B.iuser=#{iuser}
